channel.title: 2006-Revolution [Back] [Updated Tutorial Island] [Clue Scrolls 100% Highscores]
channel.description:
2006-Revolution aka Mezzyscape is a Remake of Runescape Using CreativeScape [Shard] what is different From our server is that we are actually Coding unlike.. Other Servers
Lets Start out by some info..
Main-Website: [url=http://2006-Revolution.goodluckwith.us]Website![/url]
Features:
Really Nice Combat 24/7 Online No-Lag Friendly Staff Soon Moving to a VPS Tutorial Island Minigames. Pest Control (Under Development) Castle Wars ( Few Bugs) Duel Arena Fight Pits Working Woodcutting
Pictures: [img]http://i.imgur.com/jULjE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/hRgnq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/V7T0B.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/58sym.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1VJOE.png[/img] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/pickpocket.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/karama.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/taverly.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/FjsW2.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/d9iJB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IWB3V.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IZPNL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OnMV5.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6d3dr.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/cW5sn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/oNxEL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QEasi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/60pro.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/UWICy.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/g04Xx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jAvLq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GNuGQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aSxBp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1UACB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/b0D3X.png[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MM-GpVbdRNE&list=UUJlkyZ-xWNW6CxIojbk9A8A&index=9&feature=plcp http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WS_pEyhdOIQ&list=UUJlkyZ-xWNW6CxIojbk9A8A&index=2&feature=plcp
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img]Combat
*All the normal features *Some degradable equipment *Weapon Poisoning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img]Magic
*Ancients and Normals *Working Multi Barrage *Correct hits and anims
[img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img]Ranged
*Working throwing knifes *Normal Bows and Arrows
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img]Prayer
*Burying *Working Altars *All prayers work *Draining at JAD
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] Mining *Emptying Rocks
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img]Woodcutting
Tree stumps Examine / Prospect
All the other skills are added ingame, more will be added to list.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img]Quests
Free: *Dwarf Cannon (working cannons too) *Horror from the deep *Lost City *Romeo & Juliet *Rune Mysteries (old version) *The Mage's Challenge *Dragon Slayer *Cook's assistant *Witch's Potion *Gertrude's Cat *Champions' Challenge
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img]Music and sounds
*Working Sounds *Music in areas
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img]Random Events
*Genie *Tree Spirit *Old man *Rock Golem *Tree turning in monster tree
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fqb62.png[/img]Minigames
Duel Arena Castle Wars Fight Caves Barrows Pest Control Tzhaar Caves
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img]Miscellaneous
Working Clue Scrolls A lot of working trapdoors Working Boats Working Tutorial Island Weapon poisoning Loads more!
See y'all ingame

item.title: 2006-Revolution [Back] [Updated Tutorial Island] [Clue Scrolls 100% Highscores]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Mezzyscape562, post:14, topic:465832”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=572485.msg4139821#msg4139821 date=1352047387]

Some help:

package org.cleaned.rs2.model.quests.tutorial;

import org.cleaned.rs2.model.Client;

/**
 * 
 * @author Arham 4
 */
public class Interface {

	/**
	 * Standard tutorial island interface
	 * 
	 * @param i
	 */
	public void tutorialIslandInterface(double i, Client c) {
		c.getPA().setConfig(406, i * 2 + 1);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12224);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12225);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12226);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12227);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("" + i * 10 + "%", 12224);
		c.getPA().walkableInterface(8680);

	}

	/**
	 * Creates a flashing yellow arrow on certain coordinate
	 * 
	 * @param x
	 * @param y
	 * @param h
	 * @param pos
	 */
	public void createCoordIcon(int x, int y, int h, Client c) {
		createArrow(x, y, h, 2, c);
	}

	/**
	 * createArrow method for simpler arrow methods
	 * 
	 * @param type
	 * @param id
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createArrow(int type, int id, Client c) {
		Client.outStream.createFrame(254); // The packet ID
		Client.outStream.writeByte(type); // 1=NPC, 10=Player
		Client.outStream.writeWord(id); // NPC/Player ID
		Client.outStream.write3Byte(0); // Junk
	}

	/**
	 * createArrow method for simple arrow methods
	 * 
	 * @param x
	 * @param y
	 * @param height
	 * @param pos
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createArrow(int x, int y, int height, int pos, Client c) {
		Client.outStream.createFrame(254); // The packet ID
		Client.outStream.writeByte(pos); // Position on Square(2 = middle, 3 =
											// west, 4 = east, 5 = south, 6 =
											// north)
		Client.outStream.writeWord(x); // X-Coord of Object
		Client.outStream.writeWord(y); // Y-Coord of Object
		Client.outStream.writeByte(height); // Height off Ground
	}

	/**
	 * Adds side bar menu to the client
	 * 
	 * @param menuId
	 * @param form
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void setSideBarMenu(int menuId, int form, Client c) {
		c.setSidebarInterface(menuId, form);
	}

	/**
	 * Creates a flashing yellow icon on a specific npc
	 * 
	 * @param c
	 * @param EntityIndex
	 *            defines which npc
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createEntityIcon(Client c, int EntityIndex) {
		createArrow(1, EntityIndex, c);
	}

	/**
	 * Removes a flashing yellow icon from a specific npc
	 * 
	 * @param c
	 * @param EntityIndex
	 *            defines the npc
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void removeEntityIcon(Client c, int EntityIndex) {
		createArrow(0, EntityIndex, c);
	}
}

Ty Kind sir will use
EDIT: Alright Gotta convert

I see your sudden CaPaTILizATioN aGaIN!
[/quote]
Srry man got skype? add me flavius201202[/quote]
Edited my post btw see it.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“arham 4, post:13, topic:465832”][quote author=Mezzyscape562 link=topic=572485.msg4139810#msg4139810 date=1352046489]

Some help:

package org.cleaned.rs2.model.quests.tutorial;

import org.cleaned.rs2.model.Client;

/**
 * 
 * @author Arham 4
 */
public class Interface {

	/**
	 * Standard tutorial island interface
	 * 
	 * @param i
	 */
	public void tutorialIslandInterface(double i, Client c) {
		c.getPA().setConfig(406, i * 2 + 1);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12224);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12225);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12226);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12227);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("" + i * 10 + "%", 12224);
		c.getPA().walkableInterface(8680);

	}

	/**
	 * Creates a flashing yellow arrow on certain coordinate
	 * 
	 * @param x
	 * @param y
	 * @param h
	 * @param pos
	 */
	public void createCoordIcon(int x, int y, int h, Client c) {
		createArrow(x, y, h, 2, c);
	}

	/**
	 * createArrow method for simpler arrow methods
	 * 
	 * @param type
	 * @param id
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createArrow(int type, int id, Client c) {
		Client.outStream.createFrame(254); // The packet ID
		Client.outStream.writeByte(type); // 1=NPC, 10=Player
		Client.outStream.writeWord(id); // NPC/Player ID
		Client.outStream.write3Byte(0); // Junk
	}

	/**
	 * createArrow method for simple arrow methods
	 * 
	 * @param x
	 * @param y
	 * @param height
	 * @param pos
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createArrow(int x, int y, int height, int pos, Client c) {
		Client.outStream.createFrame(254); // The packet ID
		Client.outStream.writeByte(pos); // Position on Square(2 = middle, 3 =
											// west, 4 = east, 5 = south, 6 =
											// north)
		Client.outStream.writeWord(x); // X-Coord of Object
		Client.outStream.writeWord(y); // Y-Coord of Object
		Client.outStream.writeByte(height); // Height off Ground
	}

	/**
	 * Adds side bar menu to the client
	 * 
	 * @param menuId
	 * @param form
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void setSideBarMenu(int menuId, int form, Client c) {
		c.setSidebarInterface(menuId, form);
	}

	/**
	 * Creates a flashing yellow icon on a specific npc
	 * 
	 * @param c
	 * @param EntityIndex
	 *            defines which npc
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createEntityIcon(Client c, int EntityIndex) {
		createArrow(1, EntityIndex, c);
	}

	/**
	 * Removes a flashing yellow icon from a specific npc
	 * 
	 * @param c
	 * @param EntityIndex
	 *            defines the npc
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void removeEntityIcon(Client c, int EntityIndex) {
		createArrow(0, EntityIndex, c);
	}
}

item.description:

[quote=“Mezzyscape562, post:12, topic:465832”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=572485.msg4139790#msg4139790 date=1352044842]
Some help:

package org.cleaned.rs2.model.quests.tutorial;

import org.cleaned.rs2.model.Client;

/**
 * 
 * @author Arham 4
 */
public class Interface {

	/**
	 * Standard tutorial island interface
	 * 
	 * @param i
	 */
	public void tutorialIslandInterface(double i, Client c) {
		c.getPA().setConfig(406, i * 2 + 1);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12224);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12225);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12226);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12227);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("" + i * 10 + "%", 12224);
		c.getPA().walkableInterface(8680);

	}

	/**
	 * Creates a flashing yellow arrow on certain coordinate
	 * 
	 * @param x
	 * @param y
	 * @param h
	 * @param pos
	 */
	public void createCoordIcon(int x, int y, int h, Client c) {
		createArrow(x, y, h, 2, c);
	}

	/**
	 * createArrow method for simpler arrow methods
	 * 
	 * @param type
	 * @param id
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createArrow(int type, int id, Client c) {
		Client.outStream.createFrame(254); // The packet ID
		Client.outStream.writeByte(type); // 1=NPC, 10=Player
		Client.outStream.writeWord(id); // NPC/Player ID
		Client.outStream.write3Byte(0); // Junk
	}

	/**
	 * createArrow method for simple arrow methods
	 * 
	 * @param x
	 * @param y
	 * @param height
	 * @param pos
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createArrow(int x, int y, int height, int pos, Client c) {
		Client.outStream.createFrame(254); // The packet ID
		Client.outStream.writeByte(pos); // Position on Square(2 = middle, 3 =
											// west, 4 = east, 5 = south, 6 =
											// north)
		Client.outStream.writeWord(x); // X-Coord of Object
		Client.outStream.writeWord(y); // Y-Coord of Object
		Client.outStream.writeByte(height); // Height off Ground
	}

	/**
	 * Adds side bar menu to the client
	 * 
	 * @param menuId
	 * @param form
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void setSideBarMenu(int menuId, int form, Client c) {
		c.setSidebarInterface(menuId, form);
	}

	/**
	 * Creates a flashing yellow icon on a specific npc
	 * 
	 * @param c
	 * @param EntityIndex
	 *            defines which npc
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createEntityIcon(Client c, int EntityIndex) {
		createArrow(1, EntityIndex, c);
	}

	/**
	 * Removes a flashing yellow icon from a specific npc
	 * 
	 * @param c
	 * @param EntityIndex
	 *            defines the npc
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void removeEntityIcon(Client c, int EntityIndex) {
		createArrow(0, EntityIndex, c);
	}
}

[/quote]
Ty Kind sir will use
EDIT: Alright Gotta convert :D[/quote]

I see your sudden CaPaTILizATioN aGaIN!

Btw, some more help:

http://pastebin.com/jA2yiDNe

Gave you RS guide dialogues, some Survival Expert dialogues, and Cook’s Assistant dialogues.

Some more help:

		case 9178:
			if (c.dialogueAction == 601)
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(602, 278);
			if (c.usingGlory)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.EDGEVILLE_X, Config.EDGEVILLE_Y,
						0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 2)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3428, 3538, 0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 3)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.EDGEVILLE_X, Config.EDGEVILLE_Y,
						0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 4)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3565, 3314, 0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 20) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2897, 3618, 4, "modern");
				c.killCount = 0;
			} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				// barrows
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3565, 3314, 0);
			}

			if (c.caOption4a) {
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(102, c.npcType);
				c.caOption4a = false;
			}
			if (c.caOption4c) {
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(118, c.npcType);
				c.caOption4c = false;
			}
			break;

		case 9179:
			if (c.dialogueAction == 601)
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(613, 278);
			if (c.usingGlory)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.AL_KHARID_X, Config.AL_KHARID_Y,
						0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 2)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2884, 3395, 0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 3)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3243, 3513, 0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 4)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2444, 5170, 0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 20) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2897, 3618, 12, "modern");
				c.killCount = 0;
			} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				// assault
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2605, 3153, 0);
			}
			if (c.caOption4c) {
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(120, c.npcType);
				c.caOption4c = false;
			}
			if (c.caPlayerTalk1) {
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(125, c.npcType);
				c.caPlayerTalk1 = false;
			}
			break;

		case 9180:
			if (c.dialogueAction == 601)
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(614, 278);
			if (c.usingGlory)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.KARAMJA_X, Config.KARAMJA_Y, 0,
						"modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 2)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2471, 10137, 0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 3)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3363, 3676, 0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 4)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2659, 2676, 0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 20) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2897, 3618, 8, "modern");
				c.killCount = 0;
			} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				// duel arena
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(3366, 3266, 0);
			}
			if (c.caOption4c) {
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(122, c.npcType);
				c.caOption4c = false;
			}
			if (c.caPlayerTalk1) {
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(127, c.npcType);
				c.caPlayerTalk1 = false;
			}
			break;

		case 9181:
			if (c.dialogueAction == 601)
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(612, 278);
			if (c.usingGlory)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.MAGEBANK_X, Config.MAGEBANK_Y,
						0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 2)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2669, 3714, 0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 3)
				c.getPA().startTeleport(2540, 4716, 0, "modern");
			if (c.dialogueAction == 4) {
				c.getPA().startTeleport(3366, 3266, 0, "modern");
				c.sendMessage("Dueling is at your own risk. Refunds will not be given for items lost due to glitches.");
			} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
				// tzhaar
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2444, 5170, 0);
			}
			if (c.dialogueAction == 20) {
				// c.getPA().startTeleport(3366, 3266, 0, "modern");
				// c.killCount = 0;
				c.sendMessage("This will be added shortly");
			}
			if (c.caOption4c) {
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(124, c.npcType);
				c.caOption4c = false;
			}
			if (c.caPlayerTalk1) {
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(130, c.npcType);
				c.caPlayerTalk1 = false;
			}
			break;

Hint hint: Notice the c.dialogueAction.

Some more help for Cook’s Assistant:

		case 28165:
			c.getCA().showInformation();
			break;

And some more help:

	public void showInformation() {
		for (int i = 8144; i < 8195; i++) {
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("", i);
		}
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dre@Cook's Assistant", 8144);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8145);
		if (c.cookAss == 0) {
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("Cook's Assistant", 8144);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126(
					"I can start this quest by speaking to the Cook in the",
					8147);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("Lumbridge Castle kitchen.", 8148);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("There are no minimum requirments.", 8150);
		} else if (c.cookAss == 1) {
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("Cook's Assistant", 8144);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I've talked to the cook.", 8147);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126(
					"He wants me to gather the following materials:", 8148);
			if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1944, 1)) {
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 egg", 8149);
			} else {
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@1 egg", 8149);
			}
			if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1927, 1)) {
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 bucket of milk", 8150);
			} else {
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@1 bucket of milk", 8150);
			}
			if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(1933, 1)) {
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@1 heap of flour", 8151);
			} else {
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@1 pot of flour", 8151);
			}
		} else if (c.cookAss == 2) {
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("Cook's Assistant", 8144);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I talked to the cook.", 8147);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I gave the cook his items.", 8148);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("I should go speak to the cook.", 8149);
		} else if (c.cookAss == 3) {
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("Cook's Assistant", 8144);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I talked to the cook.", 8147);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("@str@I gave him his items.", 8148);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@     QUEST COMPLETE", 8150);
			c.getPA().sendFrame126(
					"As a reward, I gained 15,000 Cooking Experience.", 8151);
		}
		c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
	}

item.title: 2006-Revolution [Back] [Updated Tutorial Island] [Clue Scrolls 100% Highscores]
item.dc:creator: @Mezzyscape562 Mezzyscape562
item.description:
@Mezzyscape562 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:11, topic:465832”]Some help:

[code=java]
package org.cleaned.rs2.model.quests.tutorial;

import org.cleaned.rs2.model.Client;

/**
*

  • @author Arham 4
    */
    public class Interface {

    /**

    • Standard tutorial island interface
    • @param i
      */
      public void tutorialIslandInterface(double i, Client c) {
      c.getPA().setConfig(406, i * 2 + 1);
      c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12224);
      c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12225);
      c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12226);
      c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12227);
      c.getPA().sendFrame126("" + i * 10 + “%”, 12224);
      c.getPA().walkableInterface(8680);

    }

    /**

    • Creates a flashing yellow arrow on certain coordinate
    • @param x
    • @param y
    • @param h
    • @param pos
      */
      public void createCoordIcon(int x, int y, int h, Client c) {
      createArrow(x, y, h, 2, c);
      }

    /**

    • createArrow method for simpler arrow methods
    • @param type
    • @param id
    • @param c
      */
      public static void createArrow(int type, int id, Client c) {
      Client.outStream.createFrame(254); // The packet ID
      Client.outStream.writeByte(type); // 1=NPC, 10=Player
      Client.outStream.writeWord(id); // NPC/Player ID
      Client.outStream.write3Byte(0); // Junk
      }

    /**

    • createArrow method for simple arrow methods
    • @param x
    • @param y
    • @param height
    • @param pos
    • @param c
      */
      public static void createArrow(int x, int y, int height, int pos, Client c) {
      Client.outStream.createFrame(254); // The packet ID
      Client.outStream.writeByte(pos); // Position on Square(2 = middle, 3 =
      // west, 4 = east, 5 = south, 6 =
      // north)
      Client.outStream.writeWord(x); // X-Coord of Object
      Client.outStream.writeWord(y); // Y-Coord of Object
      Client.outStream.writeByte(height); // Height off Ground
      }

    /**

    • Adds side bar menu to the client
    • @param menuId
    • @param form
    • @param c
      */
      public static void setSideBarMenu(int menuId, int form, Client c) {
      c.setSidebarInterface(menuId, form);
      }

    /**

    • Creates a flashing yellow icon on a specific npc
    • @param c
    • @param EntityIndex
    •        defines which npc
    • @param c
      */
      public static void createEntityIcon(Client c, int EntityIndex) {
      createArrow(1, EntityIndex, c);
      }

    /**

    • Removes a flashing yellow icon from a specific npc
    • @param c
    • @param EntityIndex
    •        defines the npc
    • @param c
      */
      public static void removeEntityIcon(Client c, int EntityIndex) {
      createArrow(0, EntityIndex, c);
      }
      }
      [/code][/quote]
      Ty Kind sir will use
      EDIT: Alright Gotta convert

item.title: 2006-Revolution [Back] [Updated Tutorial Island] [Clue Scrolls 100% Highscores]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Some help:

package org.cleaned.rs2.model.quests.tutorial;

import org.cleaned.rs2.model.Client;

/**
 * 
 * @author Arham 4
 */
public class Interface {

	/**
	 * Standard tutorial island interface
	 * 
	 * @param i
	 */
	public void tutorialIslandInterface(double i, Client c) {
		c.getPA().setConfig(406, i * 2 + 1);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12224);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12225);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12226);
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(1, 12227);
		c.getPA().sendFrame126("" + i * 10 + "%", 12224);
		c.getPA().walkableInterface(8680);

	}

	/**
	 * Creates a flashing yellow arrow on certain coordinate
	 * 
	 * @param x
	 * @param y
	 * @param h
	 * @param pos
	 */
	public void createCoordIcon(int x, int y, int h, Client c) {
		createArrow(x, y, h, 2, c);
	}

	/**
	 * createArrow method for simpler arrow methods
	 * 
	 * @param type
	 * @param id
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createArrow(int type, int id, Client c) {
		Client.outStream.createFrame(254); // The packet ID
		Client.outStream.writeByte(type); // 1=NPC, 10=Player
		Client.outStream.writeWord(id); // NPC/Player ID
		Client.outStream.write3Byte(0); // Junk
	}

	/**
	 * createArrow method for simple arrow methods
	 * 
	 * @param x
	 * @param y
	 * @param height
	 * @param pos
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createArrow(int x, int y, int height, int pos, Client c) {
		Client.outStream.createFrame(254); // The packet ID
		Client.outStream.writeByte(pos); // Position on Square(2 = middle, 3 =
											// west, 4 = east, 5 = south, 6 =
											// north)
		Client.outStream.writeWord(x); // X-Coord of Object
		Client.outStream.writeWord(y); // Y-Coord of Object
		Client.outStream.writeByte(height); // Height off Ground
	}

	/**
	 * Adds side bar menu to the client
	 * 
	 * @param menuId
	 * @param form
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void setSideBarMenu(int menuId, int form, Client c) {
		c.setSidebarInterface(menuId, form);
	}

	/**
	 * Creates a flashing yellow icon on a specific npc
	 * 
	 * @param c
	 * @param EntityIndex
	 *            defines which npc
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void createEntityIcon(Client c, int EntityIndex) {
		createArrow(1, EntityIndex, c);
	}

	/**
	 * Removes a flashing yellow icon from a specific npc
	 * 
	 * @param c
	 * @param EntityIndex
	 *            defines the npc
	 * @param c
	 */
	public static void removeEntityIcon(Client c, int EntityIndex) {
		createArrow(0, EntityIndex, c);
	}
}

As Fails said; you need to work on the little things before moving on. Since this is a remake then you more or less need every feature of the time period to be flawless to properly recreate the nostalgic feeling.
